Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory240.png'}
{3: 'More wooden signs show up every few meters. The messages on them also keep changing.'}
{3: '"Turn left here. Don\'t get it wrong."'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory237.png'}
{3: '"Red means stop, green means go... Run! Now!"'}
{3: '"Go straight! Don\'t stop!"'}
{3: 'There are a few twists and turns, but you follow the signs and manage to arrive at the destination safely.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory241.png'}
{3: '"Welcome home"'}
{3: 'The walls are about two meters tall and are painted bright red. On top of the walls are blue bricks and tiles with complicated patterns.'}
{3: "The two-door panels aren't the common steel type, but are made in timber with beautiful patterns."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Looks like we have arrived.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "It's a Kowloong style residence.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "The New Year is one of the traditional Kowloong festivals. I'm not surprised.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Huh? Is this incantation also a Kowloong tradition?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Liv points to an ink-wash painting on the door. The painting is highly abstract and not limited by mere techniques. It is full of emotions.'}
{2: "I think it's us.", 3: '30'}
{3: 'Nanami once drew your portrait with a similar style, so you immediately recognize this painting.'}
{2: 'This is Lucia.', 3: '34'}
{2: 'And this is Liv.', 3: '42'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'This must be Commandant then.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "It's quite difficult to tell.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Trust me, it's already much better than before.", 3: '48', 4: 'Looks no different from before.', 5: '51'}
{3: 'Tiger rubs against your palm.'}
{3: 'Tiger bumps into your chest.'}
{3: 'It then rises into the air and points its large eyes toward the painting. A red light quickly scans through it.'}
{3: 'Beep'}
{3: 'After the sound, the doors gradually open, making a squeaky noise.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory176.png'}
{3: 'In front of you is a Kowloong-styled mansion.'}
{1: 'RImgBg1BlowUp'}
{3: 'There are individual buildings on the four sides inside the vast mansion, which are connected through corridors.'}
{3: 'The buildings are made from green bricks and tiles, decorated by a rock garden. In the center is a giant pagoda tree with a shiny marble table under it.'}
{3: "At the entrance are the three Constructs' equipment and... a broom?"}
{1: 'RImgBg1BlowUp'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "It's our equipment.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'I sense a battle coming.', 3: '71'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Tiger, do you want us to go in?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Tiger urges you to cross the wood threshold. The moment you step into the yard, something happens.'}
{3: 'A lot of gray-black balls swarm out from all the corners: wall corner, bricks and tiles, under the tree... They soon take up almost half of the yard.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "No, I can't detect any Punishing reaction on them.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv, can I have an update on the surroundings?', 3: '89', 4: 'Relax, Lucia.', 5: '92'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'No radar signal outside the mansion. They only show up here.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Lucia nods at you, but still clenches her weapon and looks at the front vigilantly.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Their number keeps rising, but they don't seem aggressive.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Is this also Nanami's gift?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'No. Look around us.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'The walls... are deteriorating.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'The tree is also withering. The more balls there are, the faster it dies.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Let's get out of here just to be safe.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: '...The door is blocked.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The door has been engulfed in a mist. When touched, it feels like steel instead. You cannot seem to go through.'}
{3: 'More gray-black balls continue to appear, leaving less space for Gray Raven.'}
{3: 'Tiger starts to attack the balls, probably because it is annoyed by the decreasing space.'}
{1: 'PanelActor1Shake'}
{3: 'With no limbs available, it rams them with its strongest face armor. The balls are knocked away and disappear.'}
{3: 'As Tiger gets more involved, the number of gray-black balls continues to decrease. The deterioration of the surroundings has also slowed, and even started to reverse.'}
{3: 'It feels like Tiger is removing dust from the environment.'}
{3: 'Seeing what has happened, you have figured out how Nanami set her trials.'}
{2: 'We probably have to "dust and clean" this place.', 3: '125'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Dust and clean?', 4: '1'}
{3: "It's a spring tradition. Put it simple, we need to clean the house before New Year arrives."}
{3: "After last year's incident, you looked up some information, but didn't expect it to come into use here."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Dust and clean... So are these balls the dust?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "The mission is clear then. Let's clean this place together.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lucia and other members soon join the "battle."'}
{3: 'With no gun around, you look at the lonely but unmissable broom—'}
{3: 'Pick up the broom and embrace the "battlefield"—'}
{2: 'Why am I suddenly wearing an apron?!'}
